tool_description: Monitors and validates environmental conditions (temperature, humidity, vibration) required for precision dimensional calibration.
error_messages: Temperature out of range: Current temperature exceeds specified tolerance. Allow environment to stabilize before proceeding.
Humidity too high: Relative humidity exceeds maximum threshold. Use dehumidification or wait for conditions to improve.
Environmental instability detected: Conditions are fluctuating beyond acceptable limits. Wait for stabilization.
usage: Set temperature_target to the required calibration temperature (usually 20°C). Monitor will check current conditions against tolerances and report compliance status.
